title: Chris Stapleton Made Bobby Cry + Garth And Trisha Reveal Injury Details + Chuck Wicks Makes A Big Announcement
itunes:title: Chris Stapleton Made Bobby Cry + Garth And Trisha Reveal Injury Details + Chuck Wicks Makes A Big Announcement
description:
Bobby talks to Chris Stapleton about his new song “Arkansas” and writing songs for his new album. Garth Brooks and Trisha Yearwood come on to talk about his injury, their cover of Shallow and his new album FUN. Our friend, Chuck Wicks stops by to perform a couple songs and makes a big announcement! His podcast “Talk To Chuck” has launched on the Nashville Podcast Network! Check it out and subscribe HERE or search “Talk to Chuck” wherever you listen to podcasts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
